title: Blind Broken Brilliant: 3% sight, 97% attitude
description: Theresa likes being in the driver’s seat – whether it be of her life, a 250cc Kawasaki or a friend’s restored Beetle… Being legally blind, the consequences are often serious, but also seriously funny. It is with this humour and bright-side-of-life attitude that she shares her story of trials and triumphs, of faith and fear, of love and loss, of depression and also the sheer determination with which she has and is overcoming any obstacles life might throw her way.She might be legally blind, life might have broken her a little, but Theresa remains through it all, quietly brilliant.
author: Theresa Robberts
